title: Still having issues connecting to servers
body:
I have tried to join multiple games, only getting a black screen and an Unable to connect to server popup.

This is the same issue that they said they fixed a week or so ago.

Still happening to me.

replies.body:
Since we've resolved the bug that caused similar behavior, this is likely *actually* an issue with your connection to the gameservers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most frequent fixes for this particular issue.

Should you still experience this after taking those steps, we can investigate further.
